plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_lowercase
plurals.item: Lozinka mora imati barem %d malih slova
Lozinka mora imati barem 1 malo slovo

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_uppercase
plurals.item: Lozinka mora imati barem %d velikih slova
Lozinka mora imati barem 1 veliko slovo

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_symbols
plurals.item: Lozinka mora imati barem %d posebnih simbola
Lozinka mora imati barem 1 posebni simbol

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_nonletter
plurals.item: Lozinka mora imati barem %d neslovnih znakova
Lozinka mora imati barem 1 neslovni znak
